participant_1.name: Eleanor
participant_1.personality: Eleanor is adventurous and enjoys the simple pleasures in life, such as a glass of wine under the stars. She has a strong spirit and an appreciation for nostalgia.
participant_1.background: i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i'm 100 years old. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is friendly and outgoing, with a passion for country music and a laid-back lifestyle. He's always up for a chat or a good time.
participant_2.background: i am a convenience store manager. i've short brown hair. i drive a nissan pathfinder. my favourite music is country music. i met taylor swift.

content.text: Whazzup? i like to go to the movies and dance in the fall
